Name: NRE
Title: Emergency Intake: Portable Dish
Desc: "Regular nutrition helps in case of physical exertion."

Talent.Name: NRE
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When played:</color> Draw 1 random {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food Event Card from your deck.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food Event Card:</color> Draw 1 random {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food Event Card from your deck (once per Round).
